description: It can prevent chronic diseases like heart disease, as well as certain types of cancer.
It contains a large amount of phytonutrients, which can stimulate and activate the skin’s metabolism.
It helps to reduce puffiness of the eyes and lightens under-eye dark circles.
Ginseng stimulates brain cells and improves concentration and cognitive activities.
